title: [Gameplay] Can't pass 53 FPS
body:
I can't pass 53 FPS. I usually have it uncapped, and sit around 100 to 120 fps on average during any game mode that I play. I think this issue started on Jan 10th, and just became unbearable after downloading the new patch.

I've attempted many things
Updated GPU driver Rollback said driver
Turned all graphic settings down to the lowest settings on the client Flushed out my computer
Tried different internet connections for the heck of it Nothing running in the background
Reset computer multiple times Running old client, not the new one
If interested on what I"m running, I have a 8GB AMD Radeon R9 390gpu, and a i5 6500cpu@3.20ghz for basics.

I lost on what to do next, my last ditch attempt to resolve the issue is to uninstall LoL, and re download it.
It might just be a minor 7 fps drop from having 60, but god I can feel the stuttering.

Any assistance would be much appreciated! :)

replies.body: Your PC may be too good, and in which case you may need to cap per the [high specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) guide.  It would be best to update your drivers though instead of rolling it back, but there could also be bad game files dropping your fps.  Go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out possibilities and tune things up.  That should do the trick!
